In the meantime, Republicans, Mike Pence says, will use the "power of the purse" to block Obamacare's implementation. "We have a wide variety of legislative tools available." reports, Mike Pence has raised his profile a number of times in recent years- when he was elected chairman of the the House conservative caucus in 2005, when he ran for House minority leader in 2006, and when he won election as House Republican Conference chairman in 2008 to become the third-ranking Republican in the chamber. He left that post after the GOP won control of the chamber in the Nov. 2 election.
